answers.answer: Yes, that is totally me! I'm 38 weeks & all I do is drink, drink drink...
or it could be a sign of gestational diabetes. if you haven't got tested for it yet you should ask your obgyn
I'm the same way I'm 25 weeks the only thing I found that helps is Powerade I drink nothing but water am it doesn't help I would go through about 8 bottles before I give up on water
In 14 weeks and I drink so much water I go thru a case every couple of days
I'm just 6 weeks and this is happening!
I'm 31 weeks an Ive drank Gatorade my whole pregnancy! It helps for a little but I always have something next to me to drink. Or I'll die of dehydration
I am the same way. Most of the time it is just a way for your body to tell you that you need more water for baby.

question: Anyone else always thirsty? It's like I can't quench it..I am more thirsty than hungry.. :/
title: parched
